newsitem.title: USA: Dow pares gains, NYSE lifts curbs.
newsitem.headline: Dow pares gains, NYSE lifts curbs.

text.p: U.S. blue chips retreated from their session highs in late afternoon, prompting the New York Stock Exchange to lift program trading curbs.

The Dow edged back to 8136, up 22 points for the session, as late profit-taking wiped out the majority of the blue chip average's gains. Tech stocks extended to modest losses, dragging the Nasdaq Composite to a six point decline at 1563.
The NYSE lifted index-arbitrage trading curbs at 1531 EDT/1931 GMT.
